Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Imn-mrt with black painted detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face and crossed arms in relief holding two relief hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
